EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Theramore Isle" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1204) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1222) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1220) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1320) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1284) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1285) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(11198) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Theramore");
